page.title: 12PLANT-LIFE AROUND W.BERGHOLT
page.content: {SCARLET PIMPERNEL:}IT CLOSES ITS PETALS WHEN RAIN IS COMING,SO WAS USED AS A WEATHER FORECASTER.(ITS PETALS CLOSE AT 2p.m. ANYWAY.)IT IS AN ANNUAL,FLOWERING FROM MAY TO NOVEMBER. {ROSE-BAY WILLOWHERB:}THIS LIKES DAMP PLACES SUCH AS HEDGEROWS.ITS STEMS DIE EACH YEAR BUT THE ROOTS SURVIVE.THE FLOWERS ARE IN A POINTED PINK SPIKE. {RED DEAD NETTLE:}IT IS AN ANNUAL,WITH WHORLS OF RED FLOWERS AT THE TOP OF THE STEM.THE STEM IS SQUARE AND THE LEAVES ARE HEART-SHAPED,WITH TOOTHED EDGES.IT DOES NOT STING. {SOME OTHER PLANTS FOUND IN THE SURVEY: WHITE CLOVER WHITE CAMPION MULLEIN CREEPING THISTLE SPEAR THISTLE CUCKOO FLOWER PINEAPPLE MAYWEED HOGWEED SPEEDWELL {(OTHER WILD FLOWERS WOULD GROW DURING {OTHER MONTHS). }
